shape_3_per_frame1=bass_mod=max(x+abs(bass_att),x+sin(time));
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=y=.5+.5*sin(time);
shape_3_per_frame4=x=bass_mod*pow(y,2);
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=a=if(above(x,y),0,a);
shape_3_per_frame7=a2=a;
shape_3_per_frame8=border_a=.1*a;

shape_3_per_frame10=tex_zoom=bass+mid;

per_frame_2=sy=1;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=vol=(bass+mid+treb_att)*.3333;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=redsine=.5+.15*bass*sin(time*3);
per_frame_7=greensine=.5+.15*mid*sin(time*2);
per_frame_8=bluesine=.5+.15*treb*sin(time);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=redif=if(above(bass,1.2),redsine,if(above(redif,.95),0,redif*.85));
per_frame_11=greenif=if(above(mid,1.2),greensine,if(above(greenif,.95),0,greenif*.85));
per_frame_12=blueif=if(above(treb,1.2),bluesine,if(above(blueif,.95),0,blueif*.85));
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=ib_size=above(vol,1.4)*.1;
per_frame_15=ib_r=redif;
per_frame_16=ib_g=greenif;
per_frame_17=ib_b=blueif;
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=movex=above(vol,1.2)*.5*sin(time*1.8);
per_frame_20=movey=above(vol,1.2)*.5*sin(time*1.9);
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=cx=if(above(vol,1.5),.5+.5*sin(time),.5);
per_pixel_1=rot=if(above(bass,.8),atan2(atan2(rot*.1,ang),warp),0);
per_pixel_2=rot=sin(rot);
per_pixel_3=\\rot=sin(rot*10);
